title: Swarna Valayalu: Diamond-Accented Gold Bangles
features: S-shaped bangles with pave-set diamonds interspersed along the curve. Features a modern take on the traditional 'Gutti Poosalu' design element with rounded gold beads accenting each diamond. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a luxurious, antique-inspired sheen.
colors: Yellow Gold and Brilliant White Diamonds
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to traditional attire for occasions like weddings
and anniversaries. Perfect for a contemporary bride.
description: A contemporary reimagining of classic Indian jewelry, these bangles offer a luxurious blend of modern design and traditional craftsmanship. The sparkling diamonds, set against the rich gold, create a captivating and versatile accessory. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance and a distinctive character.
